p: Potential serum donor candidates are individuals who have recovered from COVID-19 with high SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibodies (above 1:160) and free of any viral and bacterial infections. 39 An initial uncontrolled case series of 5 critically-ill Chinese patients with COVID-19 demonstrated the efficiency and safety of convalescent plasma with high levels of SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibodies combined with antivirals and methylprednisolone. 40 Plasma transfusion resulted in improving the patients' clinical status, decreasing viral load, and increasing titers of neutralizing antibodies within 12 days.
